title: Horror Movie Tarot
description: You draw nine horror films as tarot cards. There's generative ambient music, streaming links, and a spread layout that actually works. Built with React, Three.js, and Tone.js.

title: AI 101: Crash Course
description: An interactive walkthrough of how generative AI actually works, written for people who haven't touched it yet. Prompt engineering, model landscape, practical advice.

title: Analytic Introspections from an Actor's Perspective
description: Long-form writing about what happens when you take psychoanalytic ideas seriously inside a rehearsal room. Attention, resistance, the body, all of it.

title: The Map and the Territory: Five Parables
description: Five short parables about the difference between mapping your life and actually living it. Wounds, identity, self-observation.

title: The Fantasy of Machine-Assisted Authorship
description: About what gets lost when you let a machine write your sentences for you. Shame, "linguistic money laundering," and the question of whether any of this counts.

title: Radiohead Ensemble Invitation
description: A glitchy interactive canvas poster made to invite people to a Radiohead ensemble show. It breaks on purpose.

title: FM Noggin
description: Personal internet radio station. A place to put music I'm listening to and see if anyone else wants to hear it.
